item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Satrughan, you can call me Sunny. As the Director of Engineering, I am currently leading the software team at Sensorflow. I have worked at Traveloka, as a Technical Product Manager within the Data team Anywhr, as the Vice President of Engineering Entrepreneur First, as a Fellow trying to building an AI portfolio manager Grasshopper, as a Software Engineer Tinkerbox (Acquired), as a Web Developer Videos of some of my work is available here:
